channel.title: SerenPS
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/cMbJw7V.png[/img][/center]
I've not posted a proper thread here in a while.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1fqzUaX.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IZmTKqY.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/907e2a4c6b41ea5d7874af29c841679f.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/a02a1812862753a347237016f00abe2c.jpg[/img]
Update Log:
[ul][*]Arrows can be posoined [*]Poisoned Arrows now poison [*]Fletching has been finished [*]Bolt enchanting [*]Packet Handling [*]Switched from Mina to Netty [*]Removed instream and outstream [*]Prayer [*]Home toggling [*]Woodcutting [*]Fishing [*]Cooking [*]Mining [*]Smithing [*]Thieving [*]Entity based Combat [*]Duel Arena [*]Clan Wars [*]Fight Caves [*]Fight Pits [*]Castle Wars [*]Puro Puro (and a base for hunter) [*]474 NPC Spawns [*]Gson drop loading. [*]Commands are now handled properly. [*]Re-wrote majority of skills and content, instead of using switch statements, skills now use enums, easier to develop and add new things to. [*]Dialogue system completely, re-written, no longer requires switch statements. [*]Update server times have been improved. [*]Nightmare Zone has been added. [*]Correct interface and button ID's now used [*]Correct packets are sent. [*]We also now have a tool to restart the Server from our browsers aswell as an app for both Android and iPhone to let us control and maintain the server on the go, execute events (double EXP, points, holiday events) on the go, also yell across the game, ban/mute users, also allows us to input commands to the Linux command line. [*]Started working on a set of tools, dump information off the OSRS Wiki aswell as RS3 (Legacy Mode), shop editors, item definitions editors, map editors, cache editor. [*]Started on Summoning base (Summoning mobs, saving mobs and mobs following you) [*]Started on a hunter base, catching Impling's, Butterflies and misc mobs that require you to catch them bare handed or with an item (not an object) [*]Dumped ingredients to make pouches for summoning, added pouch creation. [*]Put Hunter and Summoning on hold, while I worked on some Completionist Cape requirements. [*]Created a Phoenix boss, which summons Baby Pheonix's (which drop pheonix feathers) and the Pheonix (boss) level 123, drops Iban's Ashes which can be used on a Urn (which is also dropped by the Mob(s).), one the urn is filled with 200 Ashes and you have 20 Feathers (Ashes and feathers at a 50% drop rate) can be traded in to a NPC for an Inferno Adze unlocking an Achievement, Skiller's will be able to unlock the same achievement from Woodcutting, Mining & Firemaking, with some additional requirements which are yet to be decided. [*]Changed some things with Combat to make it more accurate to Runescape. [*]Added instanced Area's, so players are able to purchase boss area's to their selves. [*]Wrote some Construction things, instead of doing playerID * 4 = Height, it now creates a new instance. [*]Added mechanics to the boss, spawns Pheonix Chicks. [*]You need to put out 4 fires, before damaging the NPC, they relight every 30 Seconds. [*]Added comp cape reqirements, this is one of them. [*]Wrote a drop table, the NPC has over 200 item(s) on it's table, with economy based rates. [*]Re-wrote some of the Combat because it was messy. [*]Hired a Client Developer. [*]Fixed a possible dupe with Ground Item(s). [*]Worked on Highscore's [*]Untradeables are sent to your bank upon death. Re-wrote majority of skills and content, instead of using switch statements, skills now use enums, easier to develop and add new things to. Dialogue system completely, re-written, no longer requires switch statements. Update server times have been improved. Re-wrote majority of skills and content, instead of using switch statements, skills now use enums, easier to develop and add new things to. Dialogue system completely, re-written, no longer requires switch statements. Update server times have been improved. Nightmare Zone has been added, waves will stop spawning at 500,000 Points, if you make it this far you'll be awarded an Additional 250,000 points for your efforts. We now send correct packets, checking if what we sent is correct, unlike before, PI would just not be able to tell what's right from wrong. We also now have a tool to restart the Server from our browsers aswell as an app for both Android and iPhone to let us control and maintain the server on the go, execute events (double EXP, points, holiday events) on the go, also yell across the game, ban/mute users, also allows us to input commands to the Linux command line. Started working on a set of tools, dump information off the OSRS Wiki aswell as RS3 (Legacy Mode), shop editors, item definitions editors, map editors, cache editor. Started on Summoning base (Summoning mobs, saving mobs and mobs following you) Started on a hunter base, catching Impling's, Butterflies and misc mobs that require you to catch them bare handed or with an item (not an object) Dumped ingredients to make pouches for summoning, added pouch creation. Put Hunter and Summoning on hold, while I worked on some Completionist Cape requirements. Created a Phoenix boss, which summons Baby Pheonix's (which drop pheonix feathers) and the Pheonix (boss) level 123, drops Iban's Ashes which can be used on a Urn (which is also dropped by the Mob(s).), one the urn is filled with 200 Ashes and you have 20 Feathers (Ashes and feathers at a 50% drop rate) can be traded in to a NPC for an Inferno Adze unlocking an Achievement, Skiller's will be able to unlock the same achievement from Woodcutting, Mining & Firemaking, with some additional requirements which are yet to be decided. Changed some things with Combat to make it more accurate to Runescape. Server:[/ul]
[ul][*]Our world spawns now load 667 World spawns and NPC Definitions. [*]NPC Mechanics [*]NPC Drops improvement [*]Posoining [*]New Login Box. [*]New Loading Screen. [*]New screen to show login errors (e.g Invalid Username or Password screen). [*]634 Data, (Items, Npcs, Characters). [*]Tweening - With a toggle. [*]High Detailed Minimap(Textured & Shaped Tiles Fixed) - With a toggle. [*]Removed any toggling to do with data. [*]Added OSRS Orbs - With a toggle. [*]Added "Custom Experience Counter" - With a toggle. [*]Client performance, now runs at steady 50 FPS. [*]Abyssal Vine whip model fixes (All colours supported). [*]Fixed few bugs with High Detailed Minimap, colours would show up wrong in some areas. [*][IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/2a9b0e6b827ced7999bd70b115c9a3db.gif[/img] [*]We're aware heads don't work, but this is our custom written Dialogue using XML and also can do player checks for items or quest parts through XML. [*]We now load item and NPC definitions from our cache.[/ul]
[ul][*]Untradeable Item mechanics are now added (Developer log can be found here) along with all mechanics listed on the thread. [list] [*]Improved untradeables sent to the bank method, instead of telling you "You're untradeable item has been sent to your bank!" for each untradeable item, it now just says it once. [/list]
[*]Item Repairing has been finished for Nex sets (Torva, Pernix, Virtus) [*]Chaotic Items can now be repaired [*]Capes of Accomplishment's [list] [*]Global announcement System [*]Completionist Cape Requirements [*]Cape Purchasing. [/list]
[*]Set cool down for Void has been added. [*]Chaotics now break on death, then sent to your bank. [*]Treasure Trails [list] [*]Co-ordinate Clue's [list] [*]Check if you're in the correct location [*]Checks if you have Spade, Sextant, Watch & Chart [*]Hard & Elite Clues Scrolls spawn Saradomin, Zamorak & Guthix Wizards. [/list]
[*]Anagrams [list] [*]Dialogue check (if you have a clue, instead of using else if statement's, use our dialogue system to check) [*]Challenges & Answers [/list]
[*]Emotes [list] [*]Checks if your between W,X,Y,Z, [*]Checks for Items being equipped [*]Remember's first emote and saves it. [*]Checks if second emote has been done and saves it. [/list]
[*]Rewards [list] [*]Global Rewards [list] [*]God book pages [*]Purple Sweets [*]White Sweets [*]Firelighters. [/list]
[*]All other clues have the correct rewards. [/list] [/list][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/h9x5SFn.png[/img]
*Fixed all broken 600+ models Example.. Before: [img]http://i.imgur.com/mOshmTH.png[/img]
After: [img]http://i.imgur.com/KSW2D8X.png[/img]
*Redone tooltip positioning AGAIN. ;p - Now is PERFECT in resizable aswell. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/0b0dd46c376b2e2a8ee26a2c085ccff4.gif[/img]
*Skill Goals - Finally finished: ---- Percentage bar - Showing how close until you've finished your goal. [img]http://i.imgur.com/VmCgtBg.png[/img]
---- When you've completed your goal. [img]http://i.imgur.com/Mw2cJEg.png[/img]
---- When you select an experience goal. [img]http://i.imgur.com/KhuhdVT.png[/img]
---- When you 'Clear' your goals it goes back to normal tooltips. [img]http://i.imgur.com/M3ukjnZ.png[/img]
---- Right clicking on any skill button gives these options. [img]http://i.imgur.com/0ht1Xmh.png[/img]
*Fixed capes being 'see through' the player model.
There's more but i've mainly been focusing on skill goals.
[ul][*]Emote's will no longer cut out if their longer then 1 second [*]Unweidling an Item (that you have in your inventory) won't randomly stack [*]Item's won't go into random slots [*]Random character nulling has been patched. [*]Force chat now works correctly (previously for example Vengeance wouldn't say "Taste vengeance!".) [*]When talking with "/" in a non clanchat channel will tell you you're not in a channel and also alert you if muted.[/ul]
[ul][*]Player's were disconnecting when more then 3 people were in a region, this issue should no longer occur. [*]Item would stack once unequipped, this dupe should no longer occur. [*]Spam clicking (left/right) should no longer cause a nullpointer. [*]Some item's when spawned, would show the incorrect name, this should no longer be the case (Earth Runes would say they are Cosmic Rune's when spawned). [*]The message "invalid item" when trying to eat a Rocktail or similar foods should no longer occur [*]Korasi's sword (19784) would go into helm slot, this has been fixed.[/ul]
[ul][*]A problem when opening a store, would cause a "T2" Erorr meaning you would instantly disconnect from the Game Server, this has now been patched. [*]Shop's have recieved a mechanical make-over making them easier to use back-end and for the player [*]A bug where Shops & Item's on death weren't counting in an item's alchemy value has been patched and should no longer occur [*]An item duplication dupe concerning Item's on Death and stackable item's has now been patched and this issue should no longer occur [*]Dragon Scimitar, Godsword, Dragon Longsword, Dragon Mace, Granite Maul, Saradomin Sword all had incorrect Special Attack requirements, animations & graphics, this has now been patched accordingly. [*]The server should no longer allow you to attempt to message someone who is no longer online, previously the server would allow you to private message someone even if they weren't online, this should no longer be the case concerning Private Messages* [*]Previously while wielding a shield, wearing another shield would delete the item in your shield slot and not add it to your inventory and the same occurred with 2-handed swords, this glitch has been patched.[/ul]
[ul][*]Combat now goes up-to 138 [*]Summoning has been added, requires charms and Shard's to train [*]Pouches are brought from a store. [*]Clan chat has had a mechanical re-work, need to wait for next Client Engine re-work before is functional [*]Bank's now save. [*]Bank pin's have temporally been disabled due to glitches/problems [*]Game Time is now recorded.[/ul]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/VztaSmx.png[/img] *[/center] So I spent a good chunk of today, writing out maths, working out drop rate's, writing algorithm's and working on how we ideally want the economy to work * Clue Scrolls: *
[ul][*]Level 1 (easy) [list] [*]Level 1-20 NPC's [*]H.A.M Member's [*]1/40 kills [/list]
[*]Level 2 (medium) [list] [*]Level 21-59 NPC's [*]1/80 kills [/list]
[*]Level 3 (hard) [list] [*]Level 60+ NPC's [list] [*]1/160 kills [/list]
[/list]
[*]Level 4 (elite) [list] [*]Selected bosses: [list] [*]Corporeal Beast [*]Tormented Demon [*]Nex [*]General Graardor [*]K'ril Tsunoth [*]Commander Zilyana [*]K'ree Arra [*]Chaos Elemental [*]Dagganoth Kings [*]King Black Dragon [/list]
[*]1/320 Kills [/list][/ul]
* Nex: * Torva Pieces:
[ul][*]1/239 Kills [*]This is the rate per a piece.[/ul]
Pernix
[ul][*]1/204*Kills [*]This is the rate per a piece.[/ul]
Virtus
[ul][*]1/267*Kills [*]This is the rate per a piece.[/ul]
* Zaryte Bow:
[ul][*]1/171 Kills[/ul]
* Grimy Torstol:
[ul][*]Min 1 [*]Max 100 [*]1/82 kills[/ul]
* Coins:
[ul][*]Min: 64,500 [*]Max: 314,200 [*]1/413[/ul]
Magic Logs:
[ul][*]Min: 13 [*]Max: 134 [*]1/13[/ul]
* Kalphite Queen: *
[ul][*]Dragon Chain [*]Dragon 2-Handed Sword [*]Kalphite Queen Head [*]all have a 1/171 chance.[/ul]
* Slayer NPC's * Cave Horrors:
[ul][*]Black Mask 1/136[/ul]
Ice Strykeworm's
[ul][*]Staff of Light 1/341[/ul]
Dark Beast's
[ul][*]Dark Bow 1/171[/ul]
Abyssal Demon's
[ul][*]Abyssal Whip 1/171[/ul]
Gargoyles
[ul][*]Granite Maul 1/118[/ul]
Spiritual Mage's
[ul][*]Dragon Boot's 1/85[/ul]
Dust Devil
[ul][*]Dragon Chain 1/10883[/ul]
* [i][b]God War's (excluding Nex)[/b][/i] * K'ree Arra
[ul][*]Armadyl Hilt - 1/171 Kills. [*]Armadyl Armour 1/85 Kills [list] [*]Armadyl Helmet [*]Armadyl Chestplate [*]Armadyl Chainskirt [/list]
[*]Godsword Shard 1/105 Kills[/ul]
Armadyl Minion's
[ul][*]Armadyl Armour 1/171 Kills [list] [*]Armadyl Helmet [*]Armadyl Chestplate [*]Armadyl Chainskirt [/list]
[*]Godsword Shard 1/105 Kills[/ul]
* Genereal Graardor:
[ul][*]Bandos Hilt - 1/171 Kills. [*]Bandos*Armour 1/85 Kills [list] [*]Bandos* Chestplate [*]Bandos*Tassets [*]Bandos* Boots [/list]
[*]Godsword Shard 1/105 Kills[/ul]
Bandos* Minion's
[ul][*]Bandos* Armour 1/171 Kills [list] [*]Bandos* Helmet [*]Bandos* Chestplate [*]Bandos*Chainskirt [/list]
[*]Godsword Shard 1/105 Kills[/ul]
* Genereal Graardor:
[ul][*]Saradomin Hilt - 1/171 Kills. [*]Saradomin*Knecklaces 1/85 Kills [list] [*]Saradomin's Wisper [*]Saradomin's Murmur [*]Saradomin's Hiss [/list]
[*]Godsword Shard 1/105 Kills [*]Saradomin Sword 1/105 Kills [*]Armadyl C'bow 1/105 Kills[/ul]
* Saradomin Minion's
[ul][*]Saradomin's**Amulet's *1/171 Kills [list] [*]Saradomin's Wisper [*]Saradomin's Murmur [*]Saradomin's Hiss [/list]
[*]Godsword Shard 1/105 Kills[/ul]
* K'ril Tsutsaroth
[ul][*]Zamorak Hilt Hilt - 1/171 Kills. [*]Zamorakian Spear 1/85 Kills [*]Steam Battlestaff 1/85 Kills[/ul]
Zamorak Minion's
[ul][*]Misc *1/171 Kills [list] [*] Zamorakian Spear 1/85 Kills
[*] Steam Battlestaff 1/85 Kills
[*]Godsword Shard 1/105 Kills [/list][/ul]
* All bosses/minions
[ul][*]Frozen Key pieces 1/28 Kills [*]Crystal Key 1/56 Kills[/ul]
* Corporeal Beast
[ul][*]All Sigils (Arcane, Divine, Elysian & Spectral) [list] [*]1/171 Kills [/list]
[*]Spirit Shield [list] [*]1/33 Kills [/list]
[*]Holy Elixir 1/119[/ul]
* Tormented Demons
[ul][*]Dragon Claws [list] [*]1/333 Kills [/list]
[*]Dragon Pickaxe [list] [*]1/417 Kills [/list]
[*]Dragon Plate Piece ([font=Arial, sans-serif][size=3]Ruined dragon armour lump, Slice & Shard)[/size][/font] [list] [*]1/171 Kills [/list][/ul]
* Dragonic Visage:
[ul][*]Red Dragon's 1/4333 Kills [*]Black Dragon's*1/3666 Kills [*]Iron Dragon's*1/3333 Kills [*]Steel Dragon's*1/3000 Kills [*]Mithril Dragon's*1/2333 Kills [*]KBD Dragon's*1/1520 Kills[/ul]
* Glacor's: *
[ul][*]Boots (Steadfast, Glavian & Ragefire) [*]1/358 Kills [*]Armadyl Rune [list] [*]Minimum 20 [*]Maximum 40 [*]1/171 Kills [/list]
[*]Armadyl Battlestaff [list] [*]1/3000 Kills (full staff) [/list]
[*]Armadyl Shards [list] [*]Min: 3 [*]Max: 113 [*]1/20 Kills [/list][/ul]
There is more, waiting for feedback before posting other bosses drop rates. [indent=1]*[/indent]
Cisco's Updates:
[ul][*]PvM Changes [*]More commonly found RSPS features have made it to give it that RSPS feeling and made easier as user's feared it would be to hard [*]Some item equipment slots have been added [*]Spelling mistakes have been corrected [*]Animation's have been updated for Magic [*]Summoning now correctly reads data [*]Dungeoneering has been started [*]Purchasing certain untradeables (Void, Barbarian Assault and Slayer equipment) now use interfaces instead of a shop. [*]Some other game refferences have been added [list] [*]Pokémon [*]Demon Souls/Dark Souls [/list][/ul]
Nikki Updates:
[ul][*]Instanced Area's [list] [*]Fight Caves now use instanced areas [/list] [*]Dialogue system has been tweaked. [*]Work has begun on making: [list] [*]Pest Control [*]Recipe for Disaster [*]Corporeal Beast [/list][/ul]
Zion Updates:
[ul][*]In resizable/full screen pressing CTRL + Mousewheel will zoom in and out [*]Login Screen changes [*]Ability to toggle worlds[/ul]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3Rs-YY-m5A]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3Rs-YY-m5A[/url]
[ul][*]Dialogue Tool is now finished [*]Travelling is now finished [*]Some shortcuts now function as intended [*]Akrisae now contributes towards Kill Count and is required to be killed to open the barrows chest [*]Shooting Star & Elder tree has now been added [*]Pest Control has had minor bug fixes [*]NPC Definitions have been redumped to work as for places like Fight Caves the definitions were missing so you couldn't progress further into the mini-game [*]Player Updating has had it's required fixes to stop the random disconnecting issues [*]Summoning has been revised [*]Random events have been added [*]Thieving has had it's rewards buffed [*]Holiday events have been pre-written for 2015 and will become active a week before the holiday and will remain active till one week after the holiday. [*]Duel Arena has been fixed (previously the virtual bank that stores staked items wasn't functioning) [*]The shop editing tool has begun work on.[/ul]

item.title: SerenPS
item.dc:creator: @mr_arrows95 bansil
item.description:
@mr_arrows95 wrote:

looks pretty good.

good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: SerenPS
item.dc:creator: @kinky_whip kinky whip
item.description:
@kinky_whip wrote:

[center][/center]
[center] [/center]
What is an Instanced Area?

A instanced area is where the server replicates an area of the map and moves you to there, so no-one else can enter your area, an example of this would be Fight Caves and how Pest Control can run more then one game at once.

What is the purpose of an Instanced Area?

The purpose of an instanced area is that it prohibits people from entering your area, so you can’t get any outside help from other player’s, a lot of server’s use player Id & 4 = player height, which is on some other RSPS you can see projectiles that aren’t yours, see arrow drops and items you’ve not dropped appear in fight caves.

So with that done, here’s the break down:

An instanced area for bosses will always cost (minigames do not cost anything!):

[ul][]100,000 Coins - Solo
[]200,000 Coins - Clan (Clan Chat)[/ul]

What bosses will you be able to have your own instanced areas:

[ul][]King Black Dragon
[]Dagganoth Kings
[]Kalphite Queen
[]Corpereal Beast[/ul]

How does the clan Instanced Areas work?

For someone in your Clan Chat to join your Instanced Area they will need to be a recruit or higher to join your clan’s area, meaning that guests or friends won’t be able to join your area.

You’ll be able to toggle in your Clan Chat settings interface, whether only the Clan Owner(s) or Generals can start instanced areas.

Read full topic

[center][/center]

I’ve not posted a proper thread here in a while.

Server:[/ul]

[ul][]Our world spawns now load 667 World spawns and NPC Definitions.
[]NPC Mechanics

[]

[*]We now load item and NPC definitions from our cache.[/ul]

[ul][]Untradeable Item mechanics are now added (Developer log can be found here) along with all mechanics listed on the thread.
[list]
[]Improved untradeables sent to the bank method, instead of telling you “You’re untradeable item has been sent to your bank!” for each untradeable item, it now just says it once.
[/list]

[]Item Repairing has been finished for Nex sets (Torva, Pernix, Virtus)
[]Chaotic Items can now be repaired
[]Capes of Accomplishment’s
[list]
[]Global announcement System
[]Completionist Cape Requirements
[]Cape Purchasing.
[/list]

[]Set cool down for Void has been added.
[]Chaotics now break on death, then sent to your bank.
[]Treasure Trails
[list]
[]Co-ordinate Clue’s
[list]
[]Check if you’re in the correct location
[]Checks if you have Spade, Sextant, Watch & Chart
[*]Hard & Elite Clues Scrolls spawn Saradomin, Zamorak & Guthix Wizards.
[/list]

[]Anagrams
[list]
[]Dialogue check (if you have a clue, instead of using else if statement’s, use our dialogue system to check)
[*]Challenges & Answers
[/list]

[]Emotes
[list]
[]Checks if your between W,X,Y,Z,
[]Checks for Items being equipped
[]Remember’s first emote and saves it.
[*]Checks if second emote has been done and saves it.
[/list]

[]Rewards
[list]
[]Global Rewards
[list]
[]God book pages
[]Purple Sweets
[]White Sweets
[]Firelighters.
[/list]

[*]All other clues have the correct rewards.
[/list]
[/list][/ul]

*Fixed all broken 600+ models
Example…
Before:

After:

*Redone tooltip positioning AGAIN. ;p - Now is PERFECT in resizable aswell.

*Skill Goals - Finally finished:
---- Percentage bar - Showing how close until you’ve finished your goal.

---- When you’ve completed your goal.

---- When you select an experience goal.

---- When you ‘Clear’ your goals it goes back to normal tooltips.

---- Right clicking on any skill button gives these options.

*Fixed capes being ‘see through’ the player model.

There’s more but i’ve mainly been focusing on skill goals.

[ul][]Emote’s will no longer cut out if their longer then 1 second
[]Unweidling an Item (that you have in your inventory) won’t randomly stack
[]Item’s won’t go into random slots
[]Random character nulling has been patched.
[]Force chat now works correctly (previously for example Vengeance wouldn’t say “Taste vengeance!”.)
[]When talking with “/” in a non clanchat channel will tell you you’re not in a channel and also alert you if muted.[/ul]

[ul][]Player’s were disconnecting when more then 3 people were in a region, this issue should no longer occur.
[]Item would stack once unequipped, this dupe should no longer occur.
[]Spam clicking (left/right) should no longer cause a nullpointer.
[]Some item’s when spawned, would show the incorrect name, this should no longer be the case (Earth Runes would say they are Cosmic Rune’s when spawned).
[]The message “invalid item” when trying to eat a Rocktail or similar foods should no longer occur
[]Korasi’s sword (19784) would go into helm slot, this has been fixed.[/ul]

[ul][]A problem when opening a store, would cause a “T2” Erorr meaning you would instantly disconnect from the Game Server, this has now been patched.
[]Shop’s have recieved a mechanical make-over making them easier to use back-end and for the player
[]A bug where Shops & Item’s on death weren’t counting in an item’s alchemy value has been patched and should no longer occur
[]An item duplication dupe concerning Item’s on Death and stackable item’s has now been patched and this issue should no longer occur
[]Dragon Scimitar, Godsword, Dragon Longsword, Dragon Mace, Granite Maul, Saradomin Sword all had incorrect Special Attack requirements, animations & graphics, this has now been patched accordingly.
[]The server should no longer allow you to attempt to message someone who is no longer online, previously the server would allow you to private message someone even if they weren’t online, this should no longer be the case concerning Private Messages*
[*]Previously while wielding a shield, wearing another shield would delete the item in your shield slot and not add it to your inventory and the same occurred with 2-handed swords, this glitch has been patched.[/ul]

[ul][]Combat now goes up-to 138
[]Summoning has been added, requires charms and Shard’s to train
[]Pouches are brought from a store.
[]Clan chat has had a mechanical re-work, need to wait for next Client Engine re-work before is functional
[]Bank’s now save.
[]Bank pin’s have temporally been disabled due to glitches/problems
[*]Game Time is now recorded.[/ul]

[center]
*[/center]
So I spent a good chunk of today, writing out maths, working out drop rate’s, writing algorithm’s and working on how we ideally want the economy to work

Cisco’s Updates:

[ul][]PvM Changes
[]More commonly found RSPS features have made it to give it that RSPS feeling and made easier as user’s feared it would be to hard
[]Some item equipment slots have been added
[]Spelling mistakes have been corrected
[]Animation’s have been updated for Magic
[]Summoning now correctly reads data
[]Dungeoneering has been started
[]Purchasing certain untradeables (Void, Barbarian Assault and Slayer equipment) now use interfaces instead of a shop.
[]Some other game refferences have been added
[list]
[]Pokémon
[*]Demon Souls/Dark Souls
[/list][/ul]

Nikki Updates:

[ul][]Instanced Area’s
[list]
[]Fight Caves now use instanced areas
[/list]
[]Dialogue system has been tweaked.
[]Work has begun on making:
[list]
[]Pest Control
[]Recipe for Disaster
[*]Corporeal Beast
[/list][/ul]

Zion Updates:

[ul][]In resizable/full screen pressing CTRL + Mousewheel will zoom in and out
[]Login Screen changes
[*]Ability to toggle worlds[/ul]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3Rs-YY-m5A

[ul][]Dialogue Tool is now finished
[]Travelling is now finished
[]Some shortcuts now function as intended
[]Akrisae now contributes towards Kill Count and is required to be killed to open the barrows chest
[]Shooting Star & Elder tree has now been added
[]Pest Control has had minor bug fixes
[]NPC Definitions have been redumped to work as for places like Fight Caves the definitions were missing so you couldn’t progress further into the mini-game
[]Player Updating has had it’s required fixes to stop the random disconnecting issues
[]Summoning has been revised
[]Random events have been added
[]Thieving has had it’s rewards buffed
[]Holiday events have been pre-written for 2015 and will become active a week before the holiday and will remain active till one week after the holiday.
[]Duel Arena has been fixed (previously the virtual bank that stores staked items wasn’t functioning)
[]The shop editing tool has begun work on.[/ul]
